caption.p: Heat maps of the headspaces ( A) and essential oils ( B) in thirteen different Mentha species. LIN: linalool; LINAC: linalyl acetate; MYR: myrcene; PIPOX: piperitenone oxide; LIM: limonene; CAR: carvone; APIN: α-pinene; BPIN: β-pinene; MEN: menthone; IMEN: isomenthone; TERP: terpinen-4-ol; ATHU: α-thujene; GTERP: γ-terpinene; PCYM: p-cymene; CIN: 1,8-cineole; THY: thymol; PIP: piperitenone; DHC: dihydrocarvone; TERPAC: α-terpinyl acetate; MEH: menthofuran; MON: menthone; PUL: pulegone.
